item.title: About
item.description: This is a “hello world” example website for the blogdown package. The theme was forked from @jrutheiser/hugo-lithium-theme and modified by Yihui Xie.

item.title: What is The Linear Regression Relationship Between How The Canadian Voters Feel About Canada and Their Age
item.description: We use R(R Core Team 2020), tidyverse package (Wickham et al. 2019), dplyr package (Wickham et al. 2020), skimr package (Waring et al. 2020), devtools package (Wickham, Hester, and Chang 2020),and visdat package (Tierney 2017) to do the analysis. Code and data supporting this analysis is available at: “https://github.com/Lily-WangQian/STA304_PS1.git”. Abstract: “We investigated the data set of the Canadian Election Study online survey in 2019. The results showed us that Canadians who are older have a better impression of the native country, Canada.
